laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial elevated lipase to 240; subsequent elevated lipase to >3000.
Liver shows nodular contour compatible with cirrhosis. Common bile duct measures 7 mm with gallstones but no wall thickening. Spleen enlarged measuring 15.3 cm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable size of a 2.6 x 1.6 cm hypointense lesion in the lower pole of the left kidney, going back to previous imaging (exact date not specified).
